decision_conditions: The amendment to the approved application listed below is considered to be of a minor nature and does not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
The following amendment is deemed to be accepted:
1.	Integration of support columns to first floor balcony
2.	Change from approved timber railings to low steel rialings with glass infill panels
3.	Change from approved render colour Sky White" to "Cool Grey"
4.	Changed from approved timber privacy screen at first floor balcony to steel with opague glass infill panels
5.	Reduction in size of rear elevation bathroom window
6.	Reduction in size of front elevation shop front

The applicant is advised that this amendment relates solely to the item detailed above and not to any other deviation from the approved drawings. Furthermore this amendment does not in any way alter or remove any previous conditions imposed on the original approved application reference P0809.19
description:
Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission ref: P0809.19 dated 30/08/2019 for the following:

1. Integration of support columns to first floor balcony
2. Change from approved low timber railings to low steel railings with glass infill panels
3. Change from approved render colour 'sky white' to 'cool grey'
4. Change from approved timber privacy screen at first floor balcony to steel with opaque glass infill panels
5. Reduction in size of rear elevation bathroom window
6. Reduction in size of front elevation shop front window

(Single floor side extension to ground floor to enlarge the existing commercial (A1) use and two storey side extension for residential use (C3) comprising 1 x 1-bed and 1 x 2 bed units.)
